summary: Role-based web app where a bootstrap admin is determined by saved profile email; compliance officer needs admin rights to upload a margin file.
architectural_notes: Admin/super-admin access is granted based on an exact match between the saved user profile email and the configured bootstrap admin email; if the profile isn't saved/updated to that email, the user is treated as a normal user.
known_issues: Users may not receive admin rights if their profile email was never saved or was saved with a different email than the configured admin email (requires profile update/resave).

existing_features.title: Show an obvious, persistent warning in the authenticated UI when the logged-in user's saved profile email does not match the configured bootstrap admin email "sanjeev.vohra@gmail.com", explaining that admin rights will not be granted until the profile email is updated and saved.

Add an inline hint/validation message in the Profile Setup dialog that alerts the user when they type an email other than "sanjeev.vohra@gmail.com" that they will not receive Super Admin access unless they use the admin email.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add UI warning/banner when the logged-in user's saved profile email does not match the configured admin email, indicating admin rights will not be granted.

projectName: Add admin-email mismatch warning banner for bootstrap admin account
